short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save money shopping online with raise.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gathers the website you are shopping on and searches raise.com to find the discounted electronic gift card that would save you the most money for your specific purchase.
